scenes.narrative: There was a man who had two sons. The younger one said to his father, 'Father, give me my share of the estate.' So he divided his property between them.
scenes.title: The Son's Request

mapMarker.description: A distant land where the son squandered his wealth
mapMarker.title: Distant Country

mediaItems.altText: Young man in ragged clothes watching pigs feed
mediaItems.title: Son with the Pigs

scenes.narrative: Not long after that, the younger son got together all he had, set off for a distant country and there squandered his wealth in wild living. After he had spent everything, there was a severe famine in that whole country, and he began to be in need.
scenes.title: The Son's Rebellion

interactions.content: Like the father in this story, God welcomes us back no matter how far we've strayed. Take a moment to thank God for His unconditional love.

scenes.narrative: But while he was still a long way off, his father saw him and was filled with compassion for him; he ran to his son, threw his arms around him and kissed him.
scenes.title: The Father's Compassion
